title: Kubernetes Operators: Beyond the Basics
abstract: Join us for a deep dive into Kubernetes Operators, where we'll explore advanced patterns and real-world implementations. This session will cover custom resource definitions, operator SDK best practices, and lessons learned from production deployments. Attendees will learn how to build robust operators that can manage complex applications and integrate with existing infrastructure.
learning_objectives: Understand advanced operator patterns and anti-patterns
Learn how to implement proper error handling and reconciliation
Explore integration strategies with existing Kubernetes resources
Master operator testing and debugging techniques
speaker_bio: Experienced cloud-native developer with 5+ years working with Kubernetes and operators. Has contributed to several open-source operator projects and helped organizations adopt operator patterns in production.

title: Service Mesh Deep Dive: Istio in Production
abstract: This session provides a comprehensive look at running Istio service mesh in production environments. We'll cover deployment strategies, performance optimization, security configurations, and troubleshooting techniques. Learn from real-world experiences and discover how to maximize the benefits of service mesh while minimizing operational overhead.
learning_objectives: Deploy and configure Istio for production workloads
speaker_bio: DevOps engineer specializing in service mesh technologies and microservices architecture. Has successfully implemented Istio in multiple production environments and contributed to the Istio community.

title: GitOps: The Future of DevOps
abstract: Explore how GitOps is revolutionizing the way we deploy and manage applications. This session will demonstrate practical GitOps workflows using ArgoCD, discuss best practices for declarative deployments, and show how to implement proper GitOps patterns in your organization. Learn how to achieve better security, compliance, and operational efficiency.
learning_objectives: Design secure and compliant deployment pipelines
Integrate GitOps with existing CI/CD systems
speaker_bio: DevOps consultant with expertise in GitOps and Kubernetes. Has helped numerous organizations adopt GitOps practices and has contributed to ArgoCD documentation and community.
